items.title: OpenAI Restructures as For-Profit Company
items.description: The artificial intelligence company said that the nonprofit that controlled the organization would receive a $130 billion stake in the new company.

items.title: MacKenzie Scott Backs Disaster Recovery in Marginalized Communities
items.description: The billionaire’s $60 million donation to the Center for Disaster Philanthropy counters cuts to federal emergency assistance and diversity programs.

items.title: Memo From Bill Gates Warns Against Climate Alarmism
items.description: In a memo, the Microsoft co-founder warned against climate alarmism and appears to have shifted some of his views about climate change.

items.title: How Hurricane Melissa Got So Intense, and a ‘Plan’ for a Third Trump Term
items.description: Plus, the longest-ever World Series game.

items.title: Melissa’s Powerful Winds Could Be Even Worse in Jamaica’s Mountains
items.description: Gusts in higher elevations could be up to 30 percent stronger, the National Hurricane Center said.
